extendedInfo.description: Disc Golf Course Maps uses data from DiscGolfStats.com to display disc golf course maps.  ALL course data is provided by users of DiscGolfStats.com. Find courses in your area using GPS. Great for finding local courses when you are on the road and want to toss some plastic. Find distance between you and a hole or tee. Setup ANY course and use your GPS enabled phone to update tee and hole locations. Also includes a score manager synched up with DiscGolfStats.com. Keep track of your scores and upload them to DiscGolfStats.com when complete. All course information is provided by members of DiscGolfStats.com. All course maps are setup by members of DiscGolfStats.com. Any member of DiscGolfStats.com can change course information including course map setup. So please feel free to correct any course information that appears inaccurate. All the maps are setup by members of DiscGolfStats.com, so please be proactive and fix any inaccuracies before complaining about them which doesn't fix anything.  If you don't see courses in your area, add them. There is no way to respond to comments posted to the market. So please send comments to admin@discgolfstats.com.

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: The program won\'t start on my T-mobile galaxy s ii.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: EVO 4g
reviews.comment: App crashes as soon as I open it but it stays in the status bar until I uninstall it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just aweful
reviews.comment: Have been using the apparently for about a year now. Maps are always off. Courses on wrong sides of city. Tees and holes hundreds of yards off. Today(sept18-12) deleting. Went to 3 courses in San Antonio. Not one park was correct. Wish I could give no stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor at best
reviews.comment: Has Parks that don\'t exist at all and is not accurate on where the pads and pins are some are off by a very noticeable distance please fix
reviews.author: Seth Murchison

reviews.title: Won\'t even start up!
reviews.comment: Moto Droid x2 - hasn\'t worked for some time now. If I actually paid for it(free app) then I would ask for a refund. This is ridiculous at this point!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waste of time...
reviews.comment: Can\'t even get it to open. I have to force close it every time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unimpressive
reviews.comment: This app is garbage for local courses. All lines and not correct at all. Not worth it even for free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work...
reviews.comment: I like the full version on my computer, but the app for my phone doesn\'t work very good. Please fix!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t Launch
reviews.comment: Like many others, this app won\'t even launch on my Motorola Atrix.  So sad since no other Android apps have a built in map for disc golf. =(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashed
reviews.comment: Was not able to open. Force closed every time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and cool functionality
reviews.comment: Works great on a dell streak and looks amazing on the 5\" screen.  Found this app and spent the following 2 hours updating my nearby courses.   Awesome!  Could use a little polish on score entry and nobody likes ads on the main screen... move them to the settings screen.   Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tim
reviews.comment: I read everyone\'s negative comments but found them hard to Believe!  But I tried many times to open this app on my Samsung Galaxy S II Epic but it wouldn\'t open for me either! It\'s apparent now to me that this app is totally junk! Sad!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worked Perfect
reviews.comment: MY galaxy s2. Works. Neat app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Never opens, force close every time.
reviews.comment: Sounds like a good app... if it ever opens.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works Amazingly!!!
reviews.comment: I haven\'t had any issues on my HTC Vivid with 4.0 Android.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It sucks
reviews.comment: I can\'t say much about this app since it I\'ve never seen it. It crashes before it ever starts. It\'s like a pipe dream
reviews.author: Paul Fitzpatrick

reviews.title: Great app idea
reviews.comment: Love the idea of this app. Worked ok for me but may have found a bug with the course editing part. Don\'t let the reviews scare you away. Give it a try at least. After a restart the app is working 100%, haven\'t had a crash in 4 days.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Neat.
reviews.comment: Does as it says on HTC incredible
reviews.author: A Google User
